text: Alfred Agbesi Woyome (born January 22, 1965) is a Ghanaian businessman and a former Honorary Vice Consul of Austria to Ghana and a leading member of the National Democratic Congress. == Education == Woyome is an alumnus of Bishop Herman College in Kpando in the Volta Region of Ghana where he had his secondary education. == See also == *Martin Amidu *Betty Mould-Iddrisu == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian businesspeople
title: Alfred Agbesi Woyome
